name: AE Moto GP
description:
AE Moto GP is coming - Another masterpiece after the world's most popular moto racing game "AE 3D Motor" by AE-Mobile Inc.

At the day racing games flying everywhere, do you have some numbness to the straight race track? Do you feel the passion is being away from you? Don't worry; AE Moto GP will give you the second real fun of driving!

KEY FEATURES:
-[Curve Track] It's not the sameness of straight track, diverse scenes, sharp corners and gorgeous drift, gave you the real passion!
-[Motorcycle] Different styles of motorcycle, more flexible control, more realistic and faster.
-[Speed] Fast! Faster! Fastest! Enjoy the thrill of speed hurricane; relax your fatigue body and soul.
-[Props] Someone is faster than you? Moto is better than you? It does not matter; we can release nitrogen or launch a missile! Never drive in front of me.

GAMEPLAY:
* Gravity sensing, you just need to control the motorcycle body balance, nice turn will show a beautiful curve.
* Once you conquer one race track, you can go to the next more interesting track, enjoying the more exciting and more ornate racing.
* As your growth step by step, increasing prestige can help you to get a better motorcycle, only the stronger can conquer more.

If you like motorcycle or car games, such as Asphalt Urban GT, 3D Need For Speed, Racing Car, Sports Car Challenge, CSR Racing, Racing Moto, Asphalt Moto, Speed City Moto, Snow mayhem Moto, crazy racing 3D, Death Moto, Mountain Motorbike, Furious Highway, etc. or some speed and adventure game like Temple Run, Subway Train Surf, Skiing Champion, Ski Safari, Earn to Die, Airplane flight simulator, Turbo Fly, etc. you shouldn't miss this game.

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, any suggestions please e-mail us, thank you very much for your invaluable support!
